AppStudio Community Documentation

Building an app is a time-consuming and costly process that involves multiple teams and computing power.

Enter App Studio â€“ with App Studio, you can streamline the process by inputting your repository URL and letting us handle the pipeline building, snapshot generation, code testing, and hybrid cloud deployment. Get your app out to the world quickly and see the value it creates.

App Studio serves as the upstream code base for documentation and provides a community for learning, help, and knowledge sharing

Get Started

App Studio is a multi-tenant, software as a service (SaaS) based continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) service with an emphasis on secure supply chain features.?
